LogueEffectXmlRoot:
Thumb Training Certificate All Librarians can use Ranged Combat Pages <color=#CACACA>“Proof that you can handle firearms, at least ineffectively.”</color> .
Bad Manners! You're unable to visit shops this act <color=#CACACA>“Etiquette, you troglodyte!”</color> .
Rare Street Thug Action Figure [Consumable] Upon use gain {0} Ahn. Value grows by 3 for every battle won <color=#CACACA>“I have nothing but my— holy shit is that Roland the Street Thug™!?”</color> .
Slow Burn Burn stacks reduce by 1/3 instead of 1/4 <color=#CACACA>“Arsonist's #1 choice!”</color> .
// isn't working: localization doesn't change
Enkephalin Sticker All Librarians Emotion Level start at 1 <color=#CACACA>“Love, heart, control Enkephalin! It gets you going.”</color> .
// below is new stuff
9-14 All future cards will appear as upgraded versions of themselves <color=#CACACA>“Ps: Tuned to 'Very Fine'.”</color> .
Suppressive Fire Ranged Offensive Die gain +1 Power against enemies targeted by other Librarian’s Ranged Combat Pages <color=#CACACA>“Enemies in that direction! Copy. Erasing that direction.”</color> .
Scrap Shield Adds 1 Counter Die (Block, 2-5) to the selected Librarian’s queue. Min. and Max. value increases by 1 per chapter <color=#CACACA>““Sticks and stones may just break your bones.””</color> .
Dshka Dshka <color=#CACACA>“Dshka”</color> .
